title: The Big gull: Karoro: New Zealand's black-backed gull
creator_credit: Grant Foster, Derek Wright and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: The New Zealand black-backed gull is one of 44 species that has adapted its natural way of life, to benefit from the wasteful habits of man. With naturalist Sir Robert Falla.
